14.ara-name: كتاب البيوع عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Al-Minhal: From Iyas bin 'Abd al-Muzani who said: "The Prophet (ﷺ) prohibited selling water." [He said:] There are narrations on this topic from Jabir, Buhaisah from her father, Abu Hurairah, 'Aishah, Anas and 'Abdullah bin 'Amr. [Abu 'Eisa said:] The Hadith is Iyas is a Hasan Sahih Hadith. This is acted upon according to most of the people of knowledge, they dislike selling water. This is the view of Ibn Al-Mubarak, Ash-Shafi'i, Ahmad, and Ishaq. Some of the people of knowledge permitted selling water, Al-Hasan al-Basri is one of them

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي بَيْعِ فَضْلِ الْمَاءِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Selling Surplus Water
